Posts.Content: Mar 21, 2016 02:59AM JEQ wrote: I had a bilateral mastectomy just under a year ago, following a lumpectomy and radiotherapy ten years ago. I only itch on the side of the radiotherapy and at times it has kept me awake at night. Recently tried Rescue Remedy and it completely stopped the itch. Hope it is of help to others out there.
Posts.Title: Will I ever stop itching? Held Moderators
